Uses of Class
com.azure.storage.file.FileClientBuilder

  • Packages that use FileClientBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.azure.storage.file
    This package contains the classes to perform actions on Azure Storage File.

    • Uses of FileClientBuilder in com.azure.storage.file

      Methods in com.azure.storage.file that return FileClientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.addPolicy(HttpPipelinePolicy pipelinePolicy)
      Adds a pipeline policy to apply on each request sent.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.configuration(Configuration configuration)
      Sets the configuration object used to retrieve environment configuration values during building of the client.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.connectionString(String connectionString)
      Constructs a StorageSharedKeyCredential used to authorize requests sent to the service.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.credential(StorageSharedKeyCredential credential)
      Sets the StorageSharedKeyCredential used to authorize requests sent to the service.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.endpoint(String endpoint)
      Sets the endpoint for the Azure Storage File instance that the client will interact with.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.httpClient(HttpClient httpClient)
      Sets the HttpClient to use for sending a receiving requests to and from the service.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.httpLogOptions(HttpLogOptions logOptions)
      Sets the HttpLogOptions for service requests.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.pipeline(HttpPipeline httpPipeline)
      Sets the HttpPipeline to use for the service client.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.resourcePath(String resourcePath)
      Sets the file that the constructed clients will interact with
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.retryOptions(RequestRetryOptions retryOptions)
      Sets the request retry options for all the requests made through the client.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.sasToken(String sasToken)
      Sets the SAS token used to authorize requests sent to the service.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.serviceVersion(FileServiceVersion version)
      Sets the FileServiceVersion that is used when making API requests.
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.shareName(String shareName)
      Sets the share that the constructed clients will interact with
      FileClientBuilder FileClientBuilder.snapshot(String snapshot)
      Sets the shareSnapshot that the constructed clients will interact with.
